price: et vous établirons dans le pays après eux. Cela est pour celui qui craint Ma présence  et craint Ma menace."
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ
footnotes: [484] Par l’expression, il faut entendre la comparution des hommes devant Allah au Jour dernier.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
